cards.rules_text:
Whenever one or more counters is placed on a permanent you control, Thull'Zek deals 1 damage to each opponent.
If a creature you control with a counter on it would die, you may exile it instead. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The spores whisper of rebirth—but only after the burning of everything.[/i]

cards.rules_text: {T}: Add {G}
cards.flavor_text: [i]The ashblight claims all, yet some Myconid stand defiant, a resilience in their world as it turns to ash.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever Embercap Harvester or another creature enters under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter dies, Embercap Harvester deals 2 damage to each opponent.

Whenever Blight Forager deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.
[i]Sporeburst —[/i] At the beginning of your end step, if a counter was put on a permanent this turn, you may sacrifice Blight Forager. If you do, draw a card.

cards.rules_text: When Swellseeker enters, target land you control gains “Whenever you tap this land for mana, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature your control.” for as long as you control Swellseeker

When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
cards.flavor_text: [i]From the heart of the ashes, the blight's champion rises, its spores become a plague upon the land.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Cerebius enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn. 
Whenever another creature you control attacks, Cerebius deals 1 damage to target opponent.

Haste
Insanity Fungus enters with a +1/+1 counter on it.
If Insanity Fungus would die, you may pay {X}, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on it. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead. Otherwise exile it.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Do you know the definition of insanity?[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Aelthorn and other Fungi you control have “Ravenous. X is equal to the number of Fungi on the battlefield.” [i](This creature enters with X +1/+1 counters on it. If X is 5 or more, draw a card when it enters.)[/i]
{G}{G}: Target creature becomes a Fungus in addition to its other types.

Vigilance, Trample
When Moldborn Angel enters, exile any number of creature cards from your graveyard, then distribute that many +1/+1 counters among target creatures you control.

Graft 4 [i](This creature enters with four +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.)[/i]
[i]Sporeburst — [/i]At the beginning of your end step, if a counter was put on a permanent this turn, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Fleshfungus Puppet.

Trample
Whenever Rotcloud Overlord deals combat damage to an opponent, create that many 0/1 red and green Fungus creature tokens with “When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target.”

Devour 2 [i](As this enters, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.)[/i]
{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Dread Crawler: Dread Crawler deals 2 damage to any target.

Haste
Whenever a counter is put on a permanent you control, Sporespike Charger gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a Fungus. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Sporespike Charger and it gains trample until end of turn.
{1}{G}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. If it's a Fungus, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery.

Fungi you control have trample and haste.
Whenever a counter is put on this creature, you may put a counter of that type on another target creature you control.

Trample
Mycogiant Erupter enters with five +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever Mycogiant Erupter deals combat damage to a player, remove any amount of +1/+1 counters among creatures you control. Mycogiant Erupter deals damage to each other creature and opponent equal to the number of counters removed this way.

Menace [i](This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)[/i]
{X}{X}{R}: Corpsefire Stalker deals X damage to itself and target creature.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The grave couldn't hold the spores, or the embers within.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Slipspore Infiltrator can't be blocked by more than one creature as long as it has a counter on it.
[i]Sporeburst — [/i]At the beginning of your end step, if a counter was put on a permanent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Slipspore Infiltrator.

{G}, {T}: If damage would be dealt to another creature you control, prevent that damage. Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature for each 2 damage prevented this way.
{1}{G}, {T}: This creature deals damage to equal to its power to another target creature. Then, sacrifice this creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

Whenever a creature you control with a counter on it dies, you may return another creature card with mana value less than the number of counters on that creature from your graveyard to your hand. Do this only once each turn.

First strike
Whenever a creature an opponent controls attacks alone, you may have Corridor Cordyceps fight that creature. [i](Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]In tight stone tunnels, the Ashspores don't bloom—they hunt.[/i]

cards.rules_text:

cards.rules_text:

cards.rules_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. If target creature is a Fungus, return target Fungus creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
